Which of the following statements describes Cognitive Robotic Process Automation (CRPA)?

a.option: It is a new technology that enables bots to mimic human actions.
It is a process of collecting cognitive data from applications.
It is an integration of cognitive processes to robotic process automation.
Currently, it is used in combination with Artificial Intelligence in 44% of the total companies globally.

a.option: It has been used since the early 90s.

q:
What is the following statement referring to:

"Using preconfigured software that uses business rules and predefined activity to complete the autonomous execution of processes and activities".

Which of the following statements best describes this quote:

RPA technology is characterized as taking the robot out of the human.

a.option: Robots will take over and replace humans.
Robots will result in employee layoffs.
Robots will be assigned routine and repetitive tasks of humans.
Humans will be reassigned to do less challenging tasks and robots will handle the demanding tasks.

q: Which of the following statements best describes the robotic process automation?

a.option: It is the simulation of human intelligence by robots.
It is the use of robots to automate repetitive procedures.
The process in which robots that make decisions with the minimum human intervention.
This process involves the ability of robots to perform tasks with manual data entry.

a.option: RPA is process-driven while AI is data-driven
RPA can be used for more sophisticated tasks while AI handles more repetitive tasks
RPA simulates human reasoning while AI mimics human actions

a.option: Logging in to a web platform
Extracting the important information from an invoice

  2. Decisions are based on inconsistent rules
  3. Standard electronic input, such as text or spreadsheet
  4. Semi-structured or not structured at all
  5. Manual and repetitive
Which of the following is a valid difference between a Test Automation tool and an RPA tool?

a.option: The RPA tool can use a mouse and a keyboard, while the TA tool is unable to.
For the RPA tool, programming knowledge is required, while no programming knowledge is required for the TA Tool.
The RPA tool automates repetitive test data, while the TA tool automates repetitive business processes.
The RPA tool reduces the number of human workers, while the TA tool reduces the execution time.

q: Which of the following can be done by the bots by using advanced cognitive features such as artificial intelligence and machine learning?

a.option: Perform their task 24/7 with no interruption
Intelligently comprehend the data they are given
input structured data and find information
